ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), RecordType.Name = "EarthLink",
OR( ISBLANK(AOE_Order_Entry_Login__c), ISBLANK(AOE_Temporary_Password__c), ISBLANK(Partner_Portal_User_Name__c), ISBLANK(Partner_Portal_Temporary_Password__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the AOE and Partner Portal info before saving record.
